title: Chaudhry Moonis Elahi sworn-in as federal minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 19 (APP): President Dr Arif Alvi administered oath of office to Chaudhry Moonis Elahi as a federal minister, here on Monday.
The oath-taking ceremony held here at the Aiwan-e-Sadr was attended by parliamentarian sand senior officials.
Live #APPNews : Oath taking ceremony on Moonis Elahi as Federal Minister https://t.co/ygftg1SIqr
